verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:1
verses.text: And it came to pass after this, that David enquired of the Lord, saying, Shall I go up into any of the cities of Judah? And the Lord said unto him, Go up. And David said, Whither shall I go up? And he said, Unto Hebron.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:2
verses.text: So David went up thither, and his two wives also, Ahinoam the Jezreelitess, and Abigail Nabal’s wife the Carmelite.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:3
verses.text: And his men that were with him did David bring up, every man with his household: and they dwelt in the cities of Hebron.
